name: pokemon-prime
description: Welcome to our Pokemon nuzlocke app. With our app you can track your progression in a nuzlocke solo or with a friend! We provide the gym leaders, elite four, and champion's pokemon and pokemon level. You can also enter the pokemon you catch, their name, original pokemon name, and evolution. We also have a designated spot for your KO pokemon R.I.P. let our app track your progress with your account when you log in, you can also have several nuzlockes saved!

scripts.develop: concurrently "cd server && npm run watch" "cd view && npm start"
scripts.install: cd view && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
